name: Muleteer
description:
Antioquia, 1927.

Jaime Alirio Atehortua has just received a letter in the port of Puerto Berrío, he must return to Medellín quickly, the load is not full on his mule and trembling he lifts the last bunch of bananas.
In this adventure, he must search for his lost mule, play El Tiple to some goblins and even flee from La Madremonte to face the witch Rosario who has tormented her family all her life.
